title: Summoner's Society Recruiting Staff & Community Members - RP Giveaway
body:
Summoners' Society (one of the biggest OCE League communities) are building up our community team to support some big plans for next year. We have some great people already but we are still looking for extra admins, streamers & casters for our production crew launching in Jan 2016. To celebrate this and our Australian PC Gamers 7000 member milestone anyone who is in Summoners' Society from now until when we hit the 4k member mark will go into a draw to win 2 x $10 Riot Points Cards.

Join here: https://www.facebook.com/groups/SummonersSocietyOCE/

If you are interested in joining the Stream Team, running online and live LAN events or community management, then you can fill in an application http://www.australianpcgamers.com/forum/forums/central-hub/community-information/recruitment/
